Description of incident: The University Illinois Chicago (UIC) notified former students of a data breach to their system that included the exposure of personal data."A website security breach made two College of Business Administration  documents from the 2002 spring semester accessible — a roster from a  Special Topics in Accounting course and an advising list for all junior  and senior accounting majors, according to a statement from the  university".Personal information was exposed, including Social Security numbers. The university has not stated how many students were affected, and the breach is currently under investigation.
